title: I've been wearing Pat McGrath's £145 foundation system for a month, but is it worth the price?
text:
From the brand's very first launch (a bright gold eye-catching pigment - Gold 001 - which sold out in five minutes flat) I've been obsessed with Pat McGrath Labs. McGrath herself has been a tastemaker in the beauty industry for over 20 years and is regularly dubbed the most influential makeup artist in the world.

Having worked backstage at fashion shows, launching luxury cosmetic brands (including Giorgio Armani's famed beauty line) and on thousands of editorial and campaign photoshoots, she knows what it takes to make a great makeup range. So when she launched not just a foundation, but a complete base 'system' for flawless skin, I waited patiently for the launch (then impatiently when teaser...
